ComicInfo.Summary:
The new ongoing series starring Tefe Holland, daughter of comics' original Swamp Thing reveals new secrets about the young elemental. Tefe Holland is back, and her elemental blood has drawn her back into the Green, a realm she was born to rule, but one her half-human mind barely recognizes. While Tefe takes the tour to its shocking conclusion, Abby Arcane, unaware her daughter is alive, tells a bone-chilling tale of how her search for Tefe reunited the world's greatest couple in joy, blood, and a desperate, magical pact.
Notes:
The cover is a homage of the Pieta.
